001package edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import android.view.Menu;
005import android.view.MenuItem;
006import android.view.View;
007import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
008import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
009import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
010import androidx.navigation.NavController;
011import androidx.navigation.fragment.NavHostFragment;
012import androidx.navigation.ui.AppBarConfiguration;
013import androidx.navigation.ui.NavigationUI;
014import com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignInAccount;
015import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.R;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.databinding.ActivityMainBinding;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.viewmodel.ApodViewModel;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.viewmodel.LoginViewModel;
020
021@AndroidEntryPoint
022public class MainActivity extends AppCompatActivity {
023
024  private static final String TAG = MainActivity.class.getSimpleName();
025
026  private ActivityMainBinding binding;
027  private NavController navController;
028  private AppBarConfiguration appBarConfig;
029  private LoginViewModel loginViewModel;
030  private ApodViewModel apodViewModel;
031  /**
032   * @noinspection deprecation
033   */
034  private GoogleSignInAccount account;
035
036  @Override
037  protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
038    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
039    setupUI(); // Inflate the layout and set the content view
040    setupNavigation(); // Configure navigation for the app
041//    setupRandomApodFeature(); // Set up button for fetching random APODs
042  }
043
044  @Override
045  public boolean onSupportNavigateUp() {
046    return NavigationUI.navigateUp(navController, appBarConfig);
047  }
048
049  private void setupUI() {
050    // Inflate the layout using ViewBinding
051    binding = ActivityMainBinding.inflate(getLayoutInflater());
052    setContentView(binding.getRoot());
053  }
054
055
056  private void setupViewModel() {
057    ViewModelProvider provider = new ViewModelProvider(this);
058    loginViewModel = provider.get(LoginViewModel.class);
059    loginViewModel
060        .getAccount()
061        .observe(this, account -> {
062          binding.bottomNavigationView.setVisibility(account == null ? View.GONE : View.VISIBLE);
063          this.account = account;
064          invalidateMenu();
065          // TODO: 3/29/2025 If account is null and in other fragments not prelogin or login, then navigate to prelogin 
066        });
067
068    apodViewModel = provider.get(ApodViewModel.class);
069  }
070
071  
072  private void setupNavigation() {
073    // Configure AppBar to include all top-level destinations
074    appBarConfig = new AppBarConfiguration.Builder(
075        R.id.calendar_fragment,
076        R.id.favorites_fragment,
077        R.id.birthday_fragment
078    ).build();
079
080    // Obtain the NavController from the NavHostFragment
081    navController = ((NavHostFragment) binding.navHostFragment.getFragment())
082        .getNavController();
083
084    // Set up ActionBar with the NavController and AppBarConfiguration
085    NavigationUI.setupActionBarWithNavController(this, navController, appBarConfig);
086    NavigationUI.setupWithNavController(binding.bottomNavigationView, navController);
087  }
088
089//  private void setupRandomApodFeature() {
090    // Initialize ViewModel for APOD operations
091//    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(this).get(ApodViewModel.class);
092
093    // Find the button in the layout and set up its functionality
094//    Button randomButton = findViewById(R.id.random_button);
095//    randomButton.setOnClickListener((view) -> {
096      // Fetch 5 random APODs when the button is clicked
097//      viewModel.fetchRandomApods(5);
098//    });
099//  }
100
101
102  @Override
103  public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(@NonNull MenuItem item) {
104    return super.onOptionsItemSelected(item);
105    // TODO: 3/29/2025 Check to see if signout option was selected, if so, invoke viewModelSignOut, viewModel will be doing the sign out 
106  }
107
108  @Override
109  public boolean onPrepareOptionsMenu(Menu menu) {
110    return super.onPrepareOptionsMenu(menu);
111    // TODO: 3/29/2025 Show or hide sign out menu option depending on whether account field is null or not 
112  }
113
114  @Override
115  public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu) {
116    return super.onCreateOptionsMenu(menu);
117    // TODO: 3/29/2025 Use getMenuInflater to inflate the menu resource with sign out option and attach to this menu 
118  }
119}
